title: missing declaration and initialization in longestWord

content.description: Consider the following incomplete method, which is intended to return the longest string in the string array words. Assume that the array contains at least one element.
content.question: public static String longestWord(String[] words){/* missing declaration and initialization */for (int k = 1; k < words.length; k++){if (words[k].length() > longest.length()){longest = words[k];}}return longest;}Which of the following can replace /* missing declaration and initialization */ so that the method will work as intended?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
